name: SpongeBob's Atlantis Squarepantis
summary: SpongeBob's Atlantis SquarePantis is a SpongeBob SquarePants video game based on the television series series and the Atlantis SquarePantis TV movie. This is the first SpongeBob game that is based on a made-for-TV movie. The game was released October 23, 2007. It is also the first by Altron. The next one would be Drawn to Life: SpongeBob SquarePants Edition. This was the last SpongeBob game to be released for the PlayStation 2 and Game Boy Advance.
